message.content:
I need to identify the value in the cash flow statement that represents the amount of profit the entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from total revenue.

Looking at the cash flow statement, the line item that represents this is "Net Profit". This is the profit figure after accounting for all operating costs, interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization.

In the given problem, the Net Profit is shown as 1105265.77 on 2024-01-28.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1105265.77'} }
```
